accountId.description: Default account if this has no events

amount.description: Expected amount if this has no events

nextDueDate.description: Next due date for the Item

transactionId.description: A single transaction ID, kept for backwards compatibility

transactionIds.description: If these are provided, the transactionId property will be ignored

accountId.description: Default account ID if this Item currently has no events

amount.description: Expected amount if this Item currently has no events

nextDueDate.description: Next due date that is set explicitly by a member

nextEvent.description: Next forecast event, included only when querying for DETAILS

previousEvent.description: Most recent paid event, included only when querying for DETAILS

processed.description: True once initial matching of all existing transactions is complete

transactionCount.description: Number of transactions linked to this calendar Item

accountId.description: Default account if this has no events

amount.description: Expected amount if this Item currently has no events

nextDueDate.description: Next due date that is set explicitly by a member

processed.description: Set to true once backend matching has completed

suggested.description: Set to false when member accepts a suggestion
